Resources.Source:
After you submit this assignment, you will not be able to make any further changes.

If you have completed the assignment, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the assignment, you can finish the assignment or close this window. Your work is already saved.
Resources.Translation:
Ko oddate to nalogo, je ne boste mogli več spreminjati.

Če ste nalogo dokončali, kliknite Oddaj.

Če naloge še ne želite oddati, jo lahko dokončate ali pa zaprete to okno. Vaše delo je že shranjeno.

Resources.Source: This training is not available. This may be because the training does not exist, or you do not have permission to view it.
Resources.Translation: Izobraževanje ni na voljo. Izobraževanje morda ne obstaja ali pa nimate dovoljenja, da bi si ga ogledali.

Resources.Source: The browser has cached an old version of files required for this page. Please refresh your browser.
Resources.Translation: Brskalnik je predpomnil starejšo različico datotek, ki so zahtevane za to stran. Osvežite brskalnik.

Resources.Source:
The attached files listed below are empty or do not exist:

Invalid files:
Resources.Translation:
Priložene datoteke, ki so naštete spodaj, so prazne ali pa ne obstajajo:

Neveljavne datoteke:

Resources.Source: The value ({1}) is not a valid value for the {0} element. The data was not updated. More information: {2}
Resources.Translation: Vrednost ({1}) za element {0} ni veljavna. Podatki niso bili posodobljeni. Dodatne informacije: {2}

Resources.Source: The value ({0}) is not a valid value for the {1} element. The data was not updated.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost ({0}) za element {1} ni veljavna. Podatki niso bili posodobljeni.

Resources.Source: The {0} parameter is required in order to display the training.
Resources.Translation: Za prikaz izobraževanja je zahtevan parameter {0}.

Resources.Source: There was a problem processing a request from this page. Try selecting a different page. More information: {0}
Resources.Translation: Pri obdelavi zahteve te strani je prišlo do težave. Poskusite izbrati drugo stran. Dodatne informacije: {0}

Resources.Source: There is a problem accessing the content. It cannot be displayed.
Resources.Translation: Pri dostopu do vsebine je prišlo do težave. Vsebine ni mogoče prikazati.

Resources.Source: The page cannot be displayed. Select a different page.
Resources.Translation: Strani ni mogoče prikazati. Izberite drugo stran.

Resources.Source: Interaction and objective information has not been properly initialized.
Resources.Translation: Vzajemno delovanje in informacije o cilju niso bile inicializirane pravilno.

Resources.Source:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this training.

If you have completed the training, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the training, click Cancel to return to the previous page.
Resources.Translation:
Ko oddate to izobraževanje, ga ne boste mogli več spreminjati.

Če ste izobraževanje dokončali, kliknite Oddaj.

Če izobraževanja še ne želite oddati, kliknite Prekliči za vrnitev na prejšnjo stran.

Resources.Source: The training cannot be displayed. Try refreshing your browser.
Resources.Translation: Izobraževanja ni mogoče prikazati. Poskusite osvežiti brskalnik.

Resources.Source:
Could not set one or more values as requested.

More information:
Resources.Translation:
Ene ali več zahtevanih vrednosti ni bilo mogoče nastaviti.

Dodatne informacije:

Resources.Source: Random access view is not supported in this application.
Resources.Translation: Pogled naključnega dostopa v tem programu ni podprt.

Resources.Source: The requested resource could not be loaded.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevanega vira ni bilo mogoče naložiti.

Resources.Source: The requested view is not supported in this application.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevan pogled v tem programu ni podprt.

Resources.Source: This training has been suspended. You can return later to resume the training.
Resources.Translation: Izobraževanje je bilo začasno zaustavljeno. Vrnete se lahko kasneje in izobraževanje nadaljujete.

Resources.Source: Please select an activity to continue with the training.
Resources.Translation: Izberite dejavnost, če želite nadaljevati izobraževanje.

Resources.Source: This training has been abandoned. You cannot make any further changes.
Resources.Translation: Izobraževanje je bilo opuščeno. Nadaljnjih sprememb ne morete narediti.

Resources.Source: The activity id {0} is not valid.
This training has been completed. You cannot make any further changes.
Resources.Translation: Izobraževanje je bilo dokončano. Nadaljnjih sprememb ne morete narediti.

Resources.Source: The element named '{0}' could not be recognized. The data was not updated.
Resources.Translation: Elementa »{0}« ni bilo mogoče prepoznati. Podatki niso bili posodobljeni.

Resources.Source: You cannot navigate to the previous page at this time. Click Continue to return to the current page.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno ne morete krmariti na prejšnjo stran. Če se želite vrniti na trenutno stran, kliknite »Nadaljuj«.

Resources.Source: There was a problem adding or updating comment data associated with this page. More information: {0}
Resources.Translation: Pri dodajanju ali posodabljanju podatkov o komentarjih, povezanih s to stranjo, je prišlo do težave. Dodatne informacije: {0}

Resources.Source: You cannot navigate to the selected page at this time. Click Continue to return to the current page.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno ne morete krmariti na izbrano stran. Če se želite vrniti na trenutno stran, kliknite »Nadaljuj«.

Resources.Source:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this training.

If you have completed the training, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the training, select an activity to continue the training.
Resources.Translation:
Ko oddate to izobraževanje, ga ne boste mogli več spreminjati.

Če ste izobraževanje dokončali, kliknite Oddaj.

Če izobraževanja še ne želite oddati, izberite dejavnost, s katero želite nadaljevati izobraževanje.

Resources.Source: There was a problem adding or updating interaction data associated with this page. More information: {0}
Resources.Translation: Pri dodajanju ali posodabljanju podatkov o vzajemnem delovanju, povezanih s to stranjo, je prišlo do težave. Dodatne informacije: {0}

Resources.Source: Review view is not supported in this application.
Resources.Translation: Pogled za pregledovanje v tem programu ni podprt.

Resources.Source: Click Continue to return to the current page.
Resources.Translation: Če se želite vrniti na trenutno stran, kliknite »Nadaljuj«.

Resources.Source: The page you requested cannot be found. Please select or move to a different page.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevane strani ni mogoče najti. Izberite drugo stran ali pa se premaknite nanjo.

Resources.Source: Data posted about the data model was invalid.
Resources.Translation: Podatki, objavljeni o tem podatkovnem modelu, so bili neveljavni.

Resources.Source: The value ({1}) is not valid for the {0} parameter.
The data on this page cannot be updated while reviewing the training.
Resources.Translation: Podatkov na tej strani med pregledovanjem izobraževanja ni mogoče posodobiti.
Prišlo je do napake. Dodatne informacije: {0}

Resources.Source: You cannot navigate to the next page at this time. Click Continue to return to the current page.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno ne morete krmariti na naslednjo stran. Če se želite vrniti na trenutno stran, kliknite »Nadaljuj«.

Resources.Source: This training has been completed. You cannot make any further changes.
Resources.Translation: Izobraževanje je bilo dokončano. Nadaljnjih sprememb ne morete narediti.
Prišlo je do napake. Dodatne informacije: {0}

Resources.Source: There was a problem adding or updating objective data associated with this page. More information: {0}
Resources.Translation: Pri dodajanju ali posodabljanju podatkov o ciljih, povezanih s to stranjo, je prišlo do težave. Dodatne informacije: {0}

Resources.Source: The {0} element cannot be modified. The data was not updated.
Resources.Translation: Elementa {0} ni mogoče spreminjati Podatki niso bili posodobljeni.

Resources.Source:
You have been assigned a new piece of work: %title%.

%description%

%url%
Resources.Translation:
You have been assigned a new piece of work: %title%.

%description%

%url%

Resources.Source: Use this page to configure SharePoint Learning Kit (SLK) for one or more Site Collections.
Resources.Translation: Uporabite to stran, če želite SharePoint Learning Kit (SLK) konfigurirati za eno ali več zbirk mest.

Resources.Source: The List Name property is set to an invalid list.
Resources.Translation: The List Name property is set to an invalid list.

Resources.Source: The View Name property is set to an invalid view.
Resources.Translation: The View Name property is set to an invalid view.

Resources.Source: The SLK Settings file path specified does not exist.
Resources.Translation: Navedena pot datotek za nastavitve SLK-ja ne obstaja.

Resources.Source: Failed to upload files [{0}]. Invalid extensions.
Resources.Translation: Failed to upload files [{0}]. Invalid extensions.

Resources.Source: Submit your solution for this assignment.
Resources.Translation: Submit your solution for this assignment.

Resources.Source: The assignment must be assigned to at least one learner.
Resources.Translation: Naloga mora biti dodeljena vsaj enemu slušatelju.

Resources.Source: The due date must be later than the start date.
Resources.Translation: Rok mora biti kasnejši kot datum začetka.

Resources.Source: The assignment (ID {0}) does not exist or you may not have permission to access it.
Resources.Translation: Naloga (ID {0}) ne obstaja ali pa nimate dovoljenja za dostop do nje.

Resources.Source: Could not get the members of group {0}.
Resources.Translation: Could not get the members of group {0}.

Resources.Source: Use this page to view the assignment submitted files.
Resources.Translation: Use this page to view the assignment submitted files.

Resources.Source: Some errors in this learning resource were repaired, but the learning resource may not function as expected.
Resources.Translation: Nekaj napak v učnem viru je bilo popravljenih, vendar pa učni vir morda ne bo deloval po pričakovanjih.

Resources.Source: A serious error occurred. Please contact your system administrator. More information has been written to the server event log.
Resources.Translation: Prišlo je do resne napake. Obrnite se na skrbnika sistema. Dodatne informacije so bile zapisane v dnevnik dogodkov strežnika.

Resources.Source: At least one file should be uploaded to submit the assignment.If you are not ready yet to submit the assignment click Cancel.
Resources.Translation: At least one file should be uploaded to submit the assignment.If you are not ready yet to submit the assignment click Cancel.

Resources.Source: Reactivating this assignment erases any scoring changes made by instructors and returns the assignment to the learner to complete again.
Resources.Translation: Vnovično aktiviranje te naloge izbriše spremembe točkovanja, ki so jih naredili predavatelji in vrne nalogo slušatelju, ki jo lahko znova izpolni.

Resources.Source: The server is currently busy. Please refresh your browser.
Resources.Translation: Strežnik je trenutno zaseden. Osvežite brskalnik.

Resources.Source: value and macroName arguments must be null if oper is "IsNull"
Resources.Translation: argumenta »value« in »macroName« morata imeti ničelni vrednosti, če ima element oper vrednost »IsNull«

Resources.Source: Add a site to this list...
Delete this assignment and all learner work (Alt+X)
Resources.Translation: Izbriši nalogo in vse delo slušatelja (Alt+X)

Resources.Source: Cannot sort on a column of type: {0}
Resources.Translation: Razvrščanje ni mogoče na stolpcu vrste: {0}

Resources.Source: Please wait while your changes are processed.
Test this link (opens in new window)
Resources.Translation: Preskusi to povezavo (odpre v novem oknu)
SharePointove gruče ni bilo mogoče najti

Resources.Source: The site {0} does not exist or is not a valid SharePoint site.
Resources.Translation: Mesto {0} ne obstaja ali pa ni veljavno SharePointovo mesto.

Resources.Source: Enumeration of the members of domain group "{0}" skipped due to timeout
Resources.Translation: Oštevilčevanje članov domenske skupine »{0}« je bilo preskočeno zaradi časovne omejitve

Resources.Source: One or more learners did not complete the assignment yet
Resources.Translation: One or more learners did not complete the assignment yet

Resources.Source: Delete this assignment and all learner work (Alt+X)
Resources.Translation: Izbriši nalogo in vse delo slušatelja (Alt+X)

Resources.Source: Cannot use Domain Users group for assigning work in SLK.
Resources.Translation: Cannot use Domain Users group for assigning work in SLK.

Resources.Source: Your learner folder does not exist, please contact your instructor.
Resources.Translation: Your learner folder does not exist, please contact your instructor.

Resources.Source: QueryString Missing RootActivityId: Activity Package Item Identifier cannot be empty or null.
Resources.Translation: V nizu QueryString manjka RootActivityId: Identifikator predmetov paketa dejavnosti ne more biti prazen ali imeti ničelne vrednosti.

Resources.Source: The Assignment file(s) submission was completed successfully.
Resources.Translation: The Assignment file(s) submission was completed successfully.

Resources.Source: The available learners and instructors for this site could not be displayed because you are not an instructor on the site.
Resources.Translation: Razpoložljivih slušateljev in predavateljev za mesto ni bilo mogoče prikazati, ker na tem mestu niste predavatelj.

Resources.Source: To use the observor role session state must be enabled for the web application.
Resources.Translation: To use the observor role session state must be enabled for the web application.

Resources.Source: assignment folder does not exist under Drop Box Document Library.
Resources.Translation: assignment folder does not exist under Drop Box Document Library.

Resources.Source: The Assignment file(s) submission was completed successfully.
Resources.Translation: The Assignment file(s) submission was completed successfully.

Resources.Source: Assignment cannot be collected as it is not yet started.
Resources.Translation: Assignment cannot be collected as it is not yet started.

Resources.Source: Please wait while your changes are processed.
The name of the list hosting the documents.
Resources.Translation: The name of the list hosting the documents.

Resources.Source: Column "{0}" not defined in LearningStore view "{1}"
Resources.Translation: Stolpec »{0}« ni definiran v pogledu LearningStore »{1}«

Resources.Source: Assignment cannot be returned as it is not yet started.
Resources.Translation: Assignment cannot be returned as it is not yet started.

Resources.Source: The site {0} has not been enabled for e-learning.
Resources.Translation: Mesto {0} ni bilo omogočeno za e-učenje.

Resources.Source:
Assignment %title% has been reactivated for you to try again.

%url%
Resources.Translation:
Assignment %title% has been reactivated for you to try again.

%url%

Resources.Source: Collecting assignments will prevent learners from continuing to work on them.
Resources.Translation: Zbiranje nalog bo slušateljem preprečilo nadaljnje delo na njih.

Resources.Source: Currently the Drop Box is unavailable. Try again later, if the problem persists contact the system administrator.
Resources.Translation: Currently the Drop Box is unavailable. Try again later, if the problem persists contact the system administrator.

Resources.Source: Assignment cannot be submitted as it is not yet started.
Resources.Translation: Assignment cannot be submitted as it is not yet started.

Resources.Source: Download a zipped file for all students' submissions for this assignment
Resources.Translation: Download a zipped file for all students' submissions for this assignment

Resources.Source: Some learners' assignments could not be saved: {0}
Resources.Translation: Nekaterih nalog slušateljev ni bilo mogoče shraniti: {0}

Resources.Source: You must set the location of an assignment before creating one.
Resources.Translation: You must set the location of an assignment before creating one.

Resources.Source: Query set name cannot be the same as a query name: {0}
Resources.Translation: Ime nabora poizvedb ne sme biti enako imenu poizvedbe: {0}

Resources.Source: The url of the site hosting the list to get the documents from. Leave blank for current site.
Resources.Translation: The url of the site hosting the list to get the documents from. Leave blank for current site.

Resources.Source: The query or query set, {0}, does not exist. Open the tool pane to specify a different query set override or remove the entry to use the default query set.
Resources.Translation: Poizvedba ali nabor poizvedb {0} ne obstaja. Odprite podokno z orodji, če želite navesti drugo preglasitev nabora poizvedb ali pa odstranite vnos, če želite uporabiti privzet nabor poizvedb.

Resources.Source: Show learners the correct answers to autograded questions when the assignment is final (Class Server learning resources only)
Resources.Translation: Pokaži slušateljem pravilne odgovore na samodejno ocenjena vprašanja, ko je naloga dokončana (samo učni viri Class Server)

Resources.Source: This page helps you create an assignment and deliver it to learners. You can specify properties of your assignment such as start date, due date, and instructions to the learner, and then choose who will be instructors or learners for this assignment.
Resources.Translation: Ta stran vam pomaga pri ustvarjanju naloge in dostavi naloge slušateljem. Navedete lahko lastnosti naloge, na primer datum začetka, rok in navodila za slušatelja ter izberete, kdo bodo predavatelji in slušatelji za to nalogo.

Resources.Source: Submitting an assignment will send it to the instructor. Once it is submitted, you will no longer be able to work on it.
Resources.Translation: Ob oddaji naloge bo ta poslana predavatelju. Po oddaji na njej ne boste več mogli delati.

Resources.Source: Cannot determine group in AD. Invalid SID {0}.
Resources.Translation: Cannot determine group in AD. Invalid SID {0}.

Resources.Source: You cannot assign to this site because you are not an instructor.
Resources.Translation: Temu mestu ne morete dodeljevati, ker niste predavatelj.

Resources.Source: View assignment submitted files updated with instructor(s) comments.
Resources.Translation: View assignment submitted files updated with instructor(s) comments.

Resources.Source: This page allows you to choose which site to assign a piece of work to.
Resources.Translation: This page allows you to choose which site to assign a piece of work to.
Seznam predavateljev ali slušateljev bo morda nepopoln, ker teh skupin ni bilo mogoče prebrati: {0} Dodatne informacije so morda na voljo v dnevniku dogodkov strežnika.

An exception occurred while creating a database:
{0}
Resources.Translation:
Pri ustvarjanju zbirke podatkov je prišlo do izjeme:
{0}

Resources.Source: if noConditionOnNull is true, macroName must be provided
Resources.Translation: če je noConditionOnNull resničen, mora biti podan parameter macroName

Resources.Source: Use this page to grade assignments you've assigned. You can also edit an assignment's properties to change its description, due dates, who it's assigned to, etc.
Resources.Translation: Uporabite to stran, če želite oceniti naloge, ki ste jih dodelili. Uredite lahko tudi lastnosti naloge, če želite spremeniti njen opis, roke, komu je dodeljena in še več.

Resources.Source: You don't have access to this page because the assignment is still not submitted by the student.
Resources.Translation: You don't have access to this page because the assignment is still not submitted by the student.

Resources.Source:
An exception occurred while deleting a database:
{0}
Resources.Translation:
Pri brisanju zbirke podatkov je prišlo do izjeme:
{0}

Resources.Source: Prevents the learner from continuing to work on the assignment, and allows you to grade it
Resources.Translation: Prepreči slušatelju nadaljevanje dela na nalogi in vam omogoči, da jo ocenite.

Resources.Source: Automatically return learner assignments when they are submitted.
Resources.Translation: Ob oddaji samodejno vrnite naloge slušateljem.

Resources.Source: Always show the web part even if not an instructor on the site.
Resources.Translation: Always show the web part even if not an instructor on the site.

Resources.Source: Click here to view all files submitted by {0} for this assignment.
Resources.Translation: Click here to view all files submitted by {0} for this assignment.

Resources.Source: One or more of the files you are trying to upload has an disallowed file extension. Permitted file extensions are {0}.
Resources.Translation: One or more of the files you are trying to upload has an disallowed file extension. Permitted file extensions are {0}.

Resources.Source: Failed to submit the assignment. More information may be available in the server event log.
Resources.Translation: Failed to submit the assignment. More information may be available in the server event log.

Resources.Source: This Web site is not accessible.
Resources.Translation: Dostop do tega spletnega mesta ni mogoč.

Resources.Source: No commented files were uploaded to
Resources.Translation: No commented files were uploaded to

Resources.Source: You do not have access to this page because you are not an instructor
Resources.Translation: You do not have access to this page because you are not an instructor

Resources.Source: The site ({0}) is not configured to use SharePoint Learning Kit. Administrators can use SharePoint Central Administration to configure SharePoint Learning Kit.
Resources.Translation: Mesto ({0}) ni konfigurirano za uporabo kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit. Skrbniki lahko uporabijo SharePointovo osrednje skrbništvo za konfiguracijo kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit.

Resources.Source: Deleting an assignment will delete all the associated learner data, including learner work and grades for the assignment. You cannot recover deleted information. Click OK to delete the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Brisanje naloge bo izbrisalo vse podatke, povezane s slušateljem, vključno z njegovim delom in ocenami za nalogo. Izbrisanih informacij ni mogoče obnoviti. Kliknite »V redu«, če želite izbrisati nalogo.

Resources.Source: The assignment will appear with all your other assignments.
Resources.Translation: Naloga bo prikazana z vsemi vašimi ostalimi nalogami.

Resources.Source: This page allows you to use a document for e-learning. You can assign the document to yourself or to someone else. When you assign a document to someone else, you can specify a SharePoint site where the assignment will appear, and choose members of that site to be instructors or learners.
Resources.Translation: Ta stran vam omogoča uporabo dokumentov za e-učenje. Lahko jih dodelite sebi ali komu drugemu. Ko dokument dodelite nekomu drugemu, lahko navedete SharePointovo mesto, kjer bo naloga prikazana, in izberete člane mesta, ki bodo predavatelji in slušatelji.

Resources.Source: The description exceeds the maximum length of 4096 characters.
Resources.Translation: Opis presega največjo dovoljeno dolžino 4096 znakov.

Resources.Source: The title exceeds the maximum length of 1000 characters.
Resources.Translation: Naslov presega največjo dovoljeno dolžino 1000 znakov.

Resources.Source: The assignment (ID {0}) does not exist or you may not have permission to access it.
Resources.Translation: Naloga (ID {0}) ne obstaja ali pa nimate dovoljenja za dostop do nje.

Resources.Source: Cannot use NT AUTHORITY\Authenticated users group for assigning work in SLK.
Resources.Translation: Cannot use NT AUTHORITY\Authenticated users group for assigning work in SLK.

Resources.Source: This name is already used for another assignment.
Resources.Translation: This name is already used for another assignment.

Resources.Source: Click here to download the current SLK Settings file
Resources.Translation: Kliknite tukaj, če želite prenesti trenutno datoteko z nastavitvami SLK-ja

Resources.Source: You don't have access to this page because the assignment is still not returned by the instructor.
Resources.Translation: You don't have access to this page because the assignment is still not returned by the instructor.

Resources.Source: Once the assignment is submitted to the instructor, it will not be accessible.
Resources.Translation: Once the assignment is submitted to the instructor, it will not be accessible.

Resources.Source: Appears as a potential observer when new assignments are created using the SharePoint Learning Kit
Resources.Translation: Appears as a potential observer when new assignments are created using the SharePoint Learning Kit

Resources.Source: Show the control for selecting a query to display in the assignment list.
Resources.Translation: Pokaže kontrolnik za izbiro poizvedbe, ki jo želite prikazati na seznamu nalog.

Resources.Source: Cannot change learner assignment because you are not an instructor for the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Cannot change learner assignment because you are not an instructor for the assignment.

Resources.Source: The assignment folder is unavailable. Try again later, if the problem persists contact the system administrator.
Resources.Translation: The assignment folder is unavailable. Try again later, if the problem persists contact the system administrator.

Resources.Source: There are no items to show in this view.
Resources.Translation: Ni elementov, ki bi jih lahko prikazali v tem pogledu.

Resources.Source: You must sign in to use SharePoint Learning Kit.
Resources.Translation: Če želite uporabljati SharePoint Learning Kit, se morate vpisati.

Resources.Source: Type the address of the SharePoint site you'd like to add.
Resources.Translation: Vnesite naslov SharePointovega mesta, ki ga želite dodati.

Resources.Source: To override autograding, enter a final score here.
Resources.Translation: Če želite preglasiti samodejno ocenjevanje, tukaj vnesite končni rezultat.

Resources.Source: Browse to the document you intend to upload.
Resources.Translation: Browse to the document you intend to upload.

Resources.Source: Problem found in SLK Settings file: {0}
Resources.Translation: V datoteki z nastavitvami SLK-ja je bila najdena težava: {0}

Resources.Source: Learners can launch and interact with the assignment, and will be listed in the grading view.
Resources.Translation: Slušatelji lahko nalogo zaženejo in na njej delajo. Našteti bodo v pogledu za ocenjevanje.

Resources.Source: No sub folder was found for this assignment for the given student name.
Resources.Translation: No sub folder was found for this assignment for the given student name.

Resources.Source: The SPWeb does not match the site specified in the constructor of the SlkStore.
Resources.Translation: SPWeb se ne ujema z mestom, ki je navedeno v konstruktorju elementa SlkStore.

Resources.Source: Assignment cannot be returned as it is still active.
Resources.Translation: Assignment cannot be returned as it is still active.

Resources.Source: Appears as a potential learner when new assignments are created using SharePoint Learning Kit.
Resources.Translation: Pri ustvarjanju nove naloge s SharePoint Learning Kit je videti kot morebiten slušatelj.

Resources.Source: The assignment will be returned to the learner automatically.

At most one of the attributes "Value" or "MacroName" may be provided, and neither may be provided if "Operator" is "IsNull" or "IsNotNull"; "MacroName" must be provided if "NoConditionOnNull" is "true"
Resources.Translation: Navedete lahko največ enega izmed atributov »Value« ali »MacroName« in nobenega, če ima »Operator« vrednost »IsNull« ali »IsNotNull«; »MacroName« morate navesti, če ima »NoConditionOnNull« vrednost »true«

Resources.Source: You cannot review the assignment until it has been returned.
Resources.Translation: Naloge ni mogoče pregledati, dokler ni bila vrnjena.

Resources.Source: Instructors can grade, edit and change users for the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Predavatelji lahko ocenjujejo in urejajo naloge ter jih dodeljujejo uporabnikom.

Resources.Source: What would you like to do with this document?
Resources.Translation: Kaj želite narediti s tem dokumentom?

Resources.Source: You cannot assign a folder. To assign all the contents of a folder, you must package its contents into a single archive file.
Resources.Translation: Mape ni mogoče dodeliti. Če želite dodeliti celotno vsebino mape, jo morate zapakirati v eno arhivsko datoteko.

Resources.Source: Email learners on creation or when changed.
Resources.Translation: Email learners on creation or when changed.
Časovna omejitev oštevilčevanja domenske skupine je potekla

Resources.Source: The learner has not started the assignment

Enter the title and description of the assignment, start and due dates, and the number of points possible for the assignment. You can also specify whether learner assignments will automatically be returned, and whether learners can see the correct answers when they review the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Vnesite naslov in opis naloge, začetne datume, roke in najvišje možno število točk za nalogo. Navedete lahko tudi, ali bodo naloge slušateljev samodejno vrnjene in ali bodo slušatelji lahko videli pravilne odgovore ob pregledu naloge.

Resources.Source: This assignment is already open in another window.
Resources.Translation: Naloga je že odprta v drugem oknu.

Resources.Source: If you clear this check box, any work completed on the assignment by this learner or group will be permanently deleted.
Resources.Translation: Če počistite to potrditveno polje, bo trajno izbrisano vse delo, ki ga je slušatelj ali skupina opravila na tej nalogi.

Resources.Source: You must specify a valid date within the range of 1/1/1900 and 12/31/8900.
Resources.Translation: Navesti morate veljaven datum v obsegu od 1/1/1900 do 31/12/8900.

Resources.Source: Edit properties of the assignment, or change instructors or learners (Alt+I)
Resources.Translation: Urejanje lastnosti naloge ali spreminjanje predavateljev ali slušateljev (Alt+I)

Resources.Source: Optionally, upload a new SLK Settings XML file. This XML file specifies the queries that are available within Assignment List Web Part, as well as other settings.
Resources.Translation: Če želite, prenesite novo datoteko XML z nastavitvami SLK-ja. Ta datoteka XML navaja poizvedbe, ki so na voljo znotraj spletnega gradnika seznama nalog, in druge nastavitve.

Resources.Source: Requested learner assignment state transition is not supported
Resources.Translation: Zahtevan prehod stanja dodeljevanja predavatelja ni podprt

Resources.Source: Can use SharePoint Learning Kit features to assign e-learning content to learners.
Resources.Translation: Funkcije kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit se lahko uporabljajo za dodeljevanje vsebine za e-učenje slušateljem.

Resources.Source: Organization not found in e-learning package
Resources.Translation: Organizacije ni bilo mogoče najti v paketu za e-učenje

Resources.Source: Current user is not a SharePoint administrator

Resources.Source: What would you like to do next?

Resources.Translation: stolpec {0} je vrnil tip {1}, pričakovan je tip {2}

Resources.Source: There are one or more problems on this page. Additional information is displayed in each section with a problem.
Resources.Translation: Na strani je prišlo do ene ali več težav. Dodatne informacije so prikazane v vsakem odseku s težavo.

Resources.Source: An error occurred. More information may be available in the server event log.
Resources.Translation: Prišlo je do napake. Dodatne informacije so morda na voljo v dnevniku dogodkov strežnika.

Resources.Source: Invalid database name "{0}". Database names may only contain letters, digits, and underscores.
Resources.Translation: Neveljavno ime zbirke podatkov »{0}«. Imena zbirk podatkov lahko vsebujejo samo črke, številke in podčrtaje.

Resources.Source: The assignment must have a title.
No folder was found for this assignment.
Resources.Translation: No folder was found for this assignment.

Resources.Source: The value ({0}) is not valid for the {1} parameter.
Use this page to complete and submit your assignment.
Resources.Translation: Uporabite to stran, če želite izpolniti in oddati nalogo.

Resources.Source: Enter grades and comments for individual learners. When you're done, click Save or OK. To exit without saving, click Cancel.
Resources.Translation: Vnesite ocene in komentarje za posamezne slušatelje. Ko končate, kliknite »Shrani«. Če želite okno zapreti brez shranjevanja, kliknite »Zapri«.

Resources.Source: Display only assignments for this site instead of all assignments in the database.
Resources.Translation: Prikaži samo naloge za to mesto in ne vse naloge v zbirki podatkov.

Resources.Source: Once you mark an assignment as complete, you will no longer be able to work on it.
Resources.Translation: Ko nalogo označite kot dokončano, na njej ne boste mogli več delati.

Resources.Source: Allows the learner to re-do the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Omogoča, da slušatelj znova naredi nalogo.

Resources.Source: You cannot perform this operation because you are not an instructor on this site ({0}).
Resources.Translation: Te operacije ne morete izvesti, ker niste predavatelj na mestu ({0}).

Resources.Source: No folder was found for this assignment
Resources.Translation: No folder was found for this assignment

Resources.Source: Upload the assignment back with comments
Resources.Translation: Upload the assignment back with comments

Resources.Source: Assign the learning resource to learners on site: {0}
Resources.Translation: Dodeli učni vir slušateljem na mestu: {0}

Resources.Source: Deleting an assignment will delete all the associated learner data, including learner work and grades for the assignment. You cannot recover deleted information.
Resources.Translation: Brisanje naloge bo izbrisalo vse podatke, povezane s slušateljem, vključno z njegovim delom in ocenami za nalogo. Izbrisanih informacij ni mogoče obnoviti.

Resources.Source: Only the learner can submit the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Only the learner can submit the assignment.

Resources.Source: You cannot grade the assignment because you are not an instructor for it.
Resources.Translation: Naloge ne morete oceniti, ker niste predavatelj zanjo.

Resources.Source: at most one of value and macroName arguments can be non-null
Resources.Translation: največ ena od vrednosti in argumentov »macroName« ima lahko vrednost, ki ni ničelna

Resources.Source: Correct answers are shown to the learner when the assignment is returned (Class Server content only).
Resources.Translation: Pravilni odgovori so slušatelju prikazani ob vrnitvi naloge (samo vsebina Class Server)

Resources.Source: RenderAs="UtcAsLocalDateTime" but ViewColumnName specifies a non-date/time column
Resources.Translation: RenderAs="UtcAsLocalDateTime", vendar pa ViewColumnName navaja stolpec, ki ne vsebuje datuma ali časa

Resources.Source: You previously cleared the final score for this learner. Click OK to overwrite the blank score with the new score of {0}. Click Cancel to leave the final score blank.
Resources.Translation: Končni rezultat tega slušatelja ste že počistili. Kliknite »V redu«, če želite prazen rezultat prepisati z novim rezultatom {0}. Kliknite »Prekliči«, če želite končni rezultat pustiti prazen.

Resources.Source: The assignment (ID {0}) does not exist or you may not have permission to access it.
Resources.Translation: Naloga (ID {0}) ne obstaja ali pa nimate dovoljenja za dostop do nje.

Resources.Source: This page helps you edit an assignment’s properties or change instructors or learners for the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Ta stran vam pomaga urediti lastnosti naloge ali spremeniti predavatelje ali slušatelje za nalogo.

Resources.Source: value and macroName arguments must be null if oper is "IsNotNull"
Resources.Translation: argumenta value in macroName morata imeti ničelni vrednosti, če ima oper vrednost »IsNotNull«

Resources.Source: The document library ({0}) does not have versioning turned on or the number of versions is limited. Editing this learning resource after you assign it could cause unpredictable results.
Resources.Translation: Knjižnica dokumentov ({0}) nima vključenega sledenje različic ali pa je število različic omejeno. Urejanje učnega vira po dodelitvi lahko povzroči nepričakovane rezultate.

Resources.Source:
Specify the SLK database that will contain e-learning assignments for the selected site collection.

  • Multiple site collections can share the same SLK database. To use an existing SLK database, enter the server and database name.
  • To create a new database, enter an existing database server and a new database name, and select Create a new database.
Resources.Translation:
Navedite zbirko podatkov SLK-ja, ki bo vsebovala naloge e-učenja za izbrano zbirko mest.

  • Več zbirk mest si lahko deli isto zbirko podatkov SLK-ja. Če želite uporabljati obstoječo zbirko podatkov SLK-ja, vnesite ime strežnika in zbirke podatkov.
  • Če želite ustvariti novo zbirko podatkov, vnesite ime obstoječega strežnika in ime nove zbirke podatkov ter izberite Ustvari novo zbirko podatkov.

Resources.Source: Open site in a new window

You have been assigned a new piece of work: %title%.

%description%

%url%

Assignment %title% has been cancelled.
Resources.Translation:
You have been assigned a new piece of work: %title%.

%description%

%url%

Assignment %title% has been cancelled.

Resources.Source: The learner assignment (ID {0}) does not exist or you may not have permission to access it.
Resources.Translation: Naloga (ID {0}) ne obstaja ali pa nimate dovoljenja za dostop do nje.

Resources.Source: SLK mapping not found for GUID {0}.
Resources.Translation: SLK mapping not found for GUID {0}.

Resources.Source: The learning resource is not valid. {0}

Specify the SharePoint permissions that will identify instructors and learners in SLK.

  • To use existing SharePoint permissions to identify instructors and learners, enter the permission names; for example, "Contribute" and "Read".
  • To create new permissions, enter the permission names and select Create permissions.

Recommended  Create "SLK Instructor" and "SLK Learner" permissions for new installations.
Resources.Translation:
Navedite SharePointova dovoljenja, ki bodo določala predavatelje in slušatelje v kompletu SLK.

  • Če želite uporabljati obstoječa SharePointova dovoljenja za prepoznavanje predavateljev in slušateljev, vnesite imena dovoljenj, na primer »Prispevanje« in »Branje«.
  • Če želite ustvariti nova dovoljenja, vnesite imena dovoljenj in izberite Ustvari dovoljenja.

Priporočeno  Za nove namestitve ustvarite dovoljenji »Predavatelj za SLK« in »Slušatelj za SLK«.

Resources.Source: The List Name property is required.
Resources.Translation: The List Name property is required.

Resources.Source: Returns the assignment to the learner for review
Only one of {0} or {1} is allowed.
Resources.Translation: Only one of {0} or {1} is allowed.

Resources.Source: An assignment folder with the same name already exists
Resources.Translation: An assignment folder with the same name already exists

Resources.Source: There are no learners on this site.
SharePoint Learning Kit is not configured correctly -- please contact your system administrator. (SLK Settings not found for SPSite {0}.)
Resources.Translation: SharePoint Learning Kit ni konfiguriran pravilno – obrnite se na skrbnika sistema. (Nastavitev SLK-ja za GUID {0} mesta SPSite ni mogoče najti.)

Resources.Source: Choose the site where you'd like to assign this learning resource:
Resources.Translation: Izberite mesto, ki mu želite dodeliti ta učni vir.

Resources.Source: LearnerAssignment is in the wrong state or doesn't have a valid attempt for this operation
Resources.Translation: LearnerAssignment je v napačnem stanju ali pa nima pravilnega poskusa za to operacijo

Resources.Source: The assignment will be returned to the learner automatically.
No assembly value given for the domain group enumerator.
Resources.Translation: No assembly value given for the domain group enumerator.

Resources.Source: The e-learning package with identifier {0} does not exist or is inaccessible
Resources.Translation: Paket za e-učenje z identifikatorjem {0} ne obstaja ali pa dostop do njega ni mogoč

Resources.Source: This Web site is not accessible.
Resources.Translation: Dostop do tega spletnega mesta ni mogoč.

Resources.Source:
-url <url> -guid <guid>
Returns the configuration for a site or web application. Use either url or guid.
Resources.Translation:
-url <url> -guid <guid>
Returns the configuration for a site or web application. Use either url or guid.

Resources.Source: The {0} parameter is missing or empty.

-url <url> [-databaseserver <database server name*>] [-databasename <database name>] [-createdatabase] [-instructorpermission <instructor permission name>] [-learnerpermission <learner permission name>] [-createpermissions] [-uploadslksettings <SLK Settings XML file name> | -defaultslksettings] [-application]
* By default, integrated authentication is used to connect to the database. To use a SQL Server user ID and password instead, append the appropriate connection string information to the database server name -- for example, instead of "MyServer", use "MyServer;user id=myacct;password=mypassword". For security reasons, integrated authentication is strongly recommended.
Only one of -uploadslksettings and -defaultslksettings can be used -application must be used when configuring a web application rather than a site collection
Resources.Translation:
-url <url> [-databaseserver <database server name*>] [-databasename <database name>] [-createdatabase] [-instructorpermission <instructor permission name>] [-learnerpermission <learner permission name>] [-createpermissions] [-uploadslksettings <SLK Settings XML file name> | -defaultslksettings] [-application]
* By default, integrated authentication is used to connect to the database. To use a SQL Server user ID and password instead, append the appropriate connection string information to the database server name -- for example, instead of "MyServer", use "MyServer;user id=myacct;password=mypassword". For security reasons, integrated authentication is strongly recommended.
Only one of -uploadslksettings and -defaultslksettings can be used -application must be used when configuring a web application rather than a site collection

Resources.Source: Controls how the control is used.
Resources.Translation: Controls how the control is used.

Resources.Source: Error creating one or more users in site collection "{0}": {1}
Resources.Translation: Napaka pri ustvarjanju enega ali več uporabnikov v zbirki mest »{0}«: {1}

Resources.Source: The site ({0}) is already in your list. Click the (show all sites) link to see your entire list.
Resources.Translation: Mesto ({0}) je že na seznamu. Kliknite povezavo (pokaži vsa mesta), če si želite ogledati celoten seznam.

Resources.Source: The learner has not submitted the assignment. To assign a grade, you must collect it.
Resources.Translation: Slušatelj še ni oddal naloge. Če želite nalogo oceniti, jo morate pobrati.

Resources.Source: Assignment cannot be reactivated as it is still active.
Resources.Translation: Assignment cannot be reactivated as it is still active.

Resources.Source: Invalid database server name "{0}". Server names may only contain letters, digits, and underscores.
Resources.Translation: Neveljavno ime strežnika z zbirko podatkov »{0}«. Imena strežnikov lahko vsebujejo samo črke, številke in podčrtaje.

Resources.Source: You must type a Web address to add a site to your site list.
Resources.Translation: Če želite mesto dodati na seznam, morate vnesti spletni naslov.

Resources.Source: Use this page to upload the assignment commented files.
Resources.Translation: Use this page to upload the assignment commented files.

Resources.Source: The learning resource does not exist or you may not have permission to access it.
Resources.Translation: Učni vir ne obstaja ali pa nimate dovoljenja za dostop do njega.

Resources.Source: The learning resource is a draft. If you assign it, learners may lose access to it once it is published or approved.
Resources.Translation: Učni vir je osnutek. Če ga dodelite, bodo slušatelji morda izgubili dostop do njega, ko bo objavljen ali odobren.

Resources.Source: The assignment has been submitted to the instructor and is not accessible.
Resources.Translation: The assignment has been submitted to the instructor and is not accessible.

Resources.Source: The score must be a number.
You cannot assign the learning resource because it is currently checked out to you. You must check it in before assigning it.
Resources.Translation: Učnega vira ni mogoče dodeliti, ker je trenutno rezerviran za vas. Pred dodelitvijo ga morate sprostiti.

Resources.Source: Assignment cannot be reactivated as it is not yet started.
Resources.Translation: Assignment cannot be reactivated as it is not yet started.

Resources.Source: The name of the view hosting the documents. Leave blank to use the default view.
Resources.Translation: The name of the view hosting the documents. Leave blank to use the default view.

Resources.Source: Assign this learning resource to yourself.
The current assignment status does not allow the requested action.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno stanje dodelitve ne dovoljuje zahtevanega dejanja.

Resources.Source: No files were found for this assignment.
Resources.Translation: No files were found for this assignment.

Resources.Source: Domain group enumeration failed for path "{0}"
Resources.Translation: Oštevilčevanje domenske skupine za pot »{0}« ni uspelo

Resources.Source: Click here to download the default SLK Settings file used in new installations
Resources.Translation: Kliknite tukaj, če želite prenesti privzeto datoteko z nastavitvami SLK-ja, ki se uporablja za nove namestitve

Resources.Source: Use this web part to keep track of your SharePoint Learning Kit assignments.
Resources.Translation: Uporabite ta spletni gradnik, če želite slediti nalogam kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit.

Resources.Source: Query or query set to display for all users instead of the default. For example, "LearnerQuerySet" or "InstructorQuerySet".
Resources.Translation: Poizvedba ali nabor poizvedb, ki naj bodo prikazan za vse uporabnike namesto privzetega. Na primer »NaborPoizvedbSlušatelja« ali »NaborPoizvedbPredavatelja«.

Resources.Source: This site is not configured to use SharePoint Learning Kit. Administrators can use SharePoint Central Administration to configure SharePoint Learning Kit.
Resources.Translation: Mesto ni konfigurirano za uporabo kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit. Skrbniki lahko uporabijo SharePointovo osrednje skrbništvo za konfiguracijo kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit.

Resources.Source: Cannot find role {0}. This is required to set Drop Box permissions.
Resources.Translation: Cannot find role {0}. This is required to set Drop Box permissions.

Resources.Source: The assignment must have at least one instructor.
Resources.Translation: Naloga mora imeti vsaj enega predavatelja.

Resources.Source: You cannot assign to the site ({0}) because you are not an instructor on that site.
Resources.Translation: Mestu ({0}) ne morete dodeljevati, ker na njem niste predavatelj.

Resources.Source:
{0}
More information has been written to the server event log.
Resources.Translation:
{0}
Dodatne informacije so bile zapisane v dnevnik dogodkov strežnika.

Resources.Source: No sub folder was found for this assignment for the given student name
Resources.Translation: No sub folder was found for this assignment for the given student name

Resources.Source: Optionally choose a document to upload to distribute and choose the document library to place it in.
Resources.Translation: Optionally choose a document to upload to distribute and choose the document library to place it in.

Resources.Source: The server is currently busy. Please retry your operation.
Resources.Translation: Strežnik je trenutno zaseden. Znova poskusite z operacijo.

Resources.Source: Failed to delete the assignment. More information may be available in the server event log.
Resources.Translation: Failed to delete the assignment. More information may be available in the server event log.

Resources.Source: An error occurred while trying to extract the uploaded file.
Resources.Translation: An error occurred while trying to extract the uploaded file.

Resources.Source: All learner assignments will be returned to the learners. If you have not graded all the assignments, some learners may receive zero points.
Resources.Translation: Vse naloge slušateljev bodo samodejno vrnjene slušateljem. Če niste ocenili vseh nalog, bodo nekateri slušatelji morda prejeli nič točk.

Resources.Source: Select a Site Collection to configure.
Resources.Translation: Izberite zbirko mest, ki jo želite konfigurirati.

Resources.Source: No commented files were uploaded, please check the zip file.
Resources.Translation: No commented files were uploaded, please check the zip file.

Resources.Source: Choose instructors and learners for the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Izberite predavatelje in slušatelje za nalogo.

Resources.Source: The site ({0}) is not a valid site on this installation of SharePoint, or you may not have permission to access it.
Resources.Translation: Mesto ({0}) ni veljavno za to namestitev SharePointa ali pa nimate dovoljenja za dostop do tega mesta.

Resources.Source: One or more learners did not complete the assignment yet
Resources.Translation: One or more learners did not complete the assignment yet

Resources.Source: If you uncheck yourself you will no longer be able to grade this assignment, or have access to this assignment’s properties.
Resources.Translation: Če se odznačite, naloge ne boste mogli več oceniti in ne boste imeli več dostopa do njenih lastnosti.

Resources.Source: This assignment has been submitted as complete. You cannot make any further changes.
Resources.Translation: Naloga je bila oddana kot dokončana. Nadaljnjih sprememb ne morete narediti.

Resources.Source: An error occurred. More information may be available in the server event log.
Resources.Translation: Prišlo je do napake. Dodatne informacije so morda na voljo v dnevniku dogodkov strežnika.

Resources.Source:
This assignment is not available.

This may be because:
  • The assignment does not exist.
  • You are accessing an assignment prior to its start date.
  • You do not have access to the requested view of the assignment.
More information may be available in the server event log.
Resources.Translation:
Naloga ni na voljo.

Razlog za to je lahko:
  • Naloga ne obstaja.
  • Poskušate pridobiti dostop do naloge pred njenim datumom začetka.
  • Nimate dostopa do zahtevanega pogleda naloge.
Dodatne informacije so morda na voljo v dnevniku dogodkov strežnika.

Resources.Source: You cannot review this assignment until it has been started by the learner.
Resources.Translation: Naloge ne morete pregledati, preden je slušatelj ni začel reševati.

Resources.Source: You cannot review this assignment until it has been returned.
Resources.Translation: Naloge ni mogoče pregledati, dokler ni bila vrnjena.

Resources.Source: Changes to this page will no longer be reflected in the grading page when you close this window. To fix this, save your changes and re-open the assignment from the grading page.
Resources.Translation: Spremembe na tej strani ne bodo več vidne na strani za ocenjevanje, ko zaprete okno. To popravite tako, da shranite spremembe in znova odprete nalogo na strani za ocenjevanje.

Resources.Source: You must sign in to access this assignment.
Resources.Translation: Če želite dostop do te naloge, se morate vpisati.

Resources.Source:
The attached files listed below are not allowed file types.

Invalid files:
Resources.Translation:
Priložene datoteke, ki so naštete spodaj, so vrste datotek, ki niso dovoljene.

Neveljavne datoteke:

Resources.Source:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this assignment.

If you have completed the assignment, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the assignment, click Cancel to return to the previous page.
Resources.Translation:
Ko oddate to nalogo, je ne boste mogli več spreminjati.

Če ste nalogo dokončali, kliknite Oddaj.

Če naloge še ne želite oddati, kliknite Prekliči, če se želite vrniti na prejšnjo stran.

Resources.Source: The assignment cannot be displayed. Try refreshing your browser.
Resources.Translation: Naloge ni mogoče prikazati. Poskusite osvežiti brskalnik.

Resources.Source: Select an activity to continue with the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Izberite dejavnost, če želite nadaljevati z nalogo.

Resources.Source:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this assignment, however you can start again.

If you have completed the assignment, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the assignment, click Cancel to return to the previous page.
Resources.Translation:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this assignment, however you can start again.

If you have completed the assignment, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the assignment, click Cancel to return to the previous page.

Resources.Source:
The attached files listed below are empty or do not exist.

Invalid files:
Resources.Translation:
Priložene datoteke, ki so naštete spodaj, so prazne ali pa ne obstajajo.

Neveljavne datoteke:

Resources.Source: This grading session is finished. You can return to this assignment later to add or change grading information.
Resources.Translation: Ocenjevanje je končano. Na nalogo se lahko vrnete pozneje, če želite dodati ali spremeniti informacije o ocenjevanju.

Resources.Source: This assignment has been suspended. You can return later to resume the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Naloga je bila začasno zaustavljena. Vrnete se lahko kasneje in jo nadaljujete.

Resources.Source: This assignment has been completed. You cannot make any further changes.
Resources.Translation: Naloga je bila dokončana. Nadaljnjih sprememb ne morete narediti.

Resources.Source: The version of the learning resource assigned for this assignment cannot be found because it has been deleted or modified.
Resources.Translation: Različice učnega vira, ki je bila dodeljena tej nalogi, ni mogoče najti, ker je bila izbrisana ali spremenjena.

Resources.Source: You cannot navigate to the previous page at this time. Click Continue to return to the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno ne morete krmariti na prejšnjo stran. Če se želite vrniti na nalogo, kliknite »Nadaljuj«.

Resources.Source:
All grading changes have been saved.

Click Finish to end this grading session. You can return to this assignment later to add or change grading information.

If you are not ready to finish grading, click Cancel to return to the previous page.
Resources.Translation:
Vse spremembe ocenjevanja so bile shranjene.

Kliknite Dokončaj, če želite končati ocenjevanje. Na nalogo se lahko vrnete pozneje, če želite dodati ali spremeniti informacije o ocenjevanju.

Če ocenjevanja še ne želite končati, kliknite Prekliči za vrnitev na prejšnjo stran.

Resources.Source: The requested document could not be found.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevanega dokumenta ni bilo mogoče najti.

Resources.Source: Administrators can change the file attachment settings in SharePoint Central Administration by modifying the SharePoint Learning Kit settings file.
Resources.Translation: Skrbniki lahko nastavitve datotečnih prilog v SharePointovem osrednjem skrbništvu spremenijo tako, da spremenijo datoteko z nastavitvami kompleta SharePoint Learning Kit.

Resources.Source:
This assignment is not available because it has been submitted as complete.

You can review this assignment after it is returned by your instructor.
Resources.Translation:
Naloga ni na voljo, ker je bila oddana kot dokončana.

Nalogo lahko pregledate, ko vam jo vrne predavatelj.

Resources.Source: The available session does not match the request view of the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Razpoložljiva seja se ne ujema s pogledom za zahtevo naloge.

Resources.Source: You cannot navigate to the selected activity at this time. Click Continue to return to the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno ne morete krmariti na izbrano dejavnost. Če se želite vrniti na nalogo, kliknite »Nadaljuj«.

Resources.Source:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this assignment.

If you have completed the assignment, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the assignment, select an activity to continue the assignment.
Resources.Translation:
Ko oddate to nalogo, je ne boste mogli več spreminjati.

Če ste nalogo dokončali, kliknite Oddaj.

Če naloge še ne želite oddati, izberite dejavnost, s katero želite nadaljevati nalogo.

Resources.Source: The assignment has been abandoned. You cannot make any further changes.
Resources.Translation: Naloga je bila opuščena. Nadaljnjih sprememb ne morete narediti.

Resources.Source: You cannot navigate to the next page at this time. Click Continue to return to the assignment.
Resources.Translation: Trenutno ne morete krmariti na naslednjo stran. Če se želite vrniti na nalogo, kliknite »Nadaljuj«.

Resources.Source:
You cannot grade this assignment until it has been submitted.

To enable grading, you can collect the assignment or have the learner submit the assignment.
Resources.Translation:
Naloge ni mogoče oceniti, dokler ni bila oddana.

Če želite ocenjevanje omogočiti, morate nalogo pobrati ali pa vam jo mora slušatelj oddati.

Resources.Source:
The attached files listed below are larger than the allowed limit of {0} KB. Reduce the size of these files and try again.

Invalid files:
Resources.Translation:
Priložene datoteke, ki so naštete spodaj, so večje od dovoljene omejitve {0} kB. Zmanjšajte velikost teh datotek in poskusite znova.

Neveljavne datoteke:

Resources.Source:
You can't review this assignment at this moment. This may be because of one of the reasons given below:
  • Learner not started the assignment
  • Learner completed the assignment and submitted to the instructor for grading
  • You do not have access to the requested view of the assignment.
Resources.Translation:
You can't review this assignment at this moment. This may be because of one of the reasons given below:
  • Learner not started the assignment
  • Learner completed the assignment and submitted to the instructor for grading
  • You do not have access to the requested view of the assignment.
